home.section_intro: In this section you will find very useful tools for your well-being. From the menu, you can access a variety of resources such as books and meditations, as well as the option to request personal sessions.

books.title: Here you will find a selection of my recommended books.

booksList.title: The Little Prince
booksList.description: The Little Prince is a classic work by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry. It tells the story of a young prince who travels through the universe, encountering peculiar characters and learning valuable life lessons.

booksList.title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
booksList.description: One Hundred Years of Solitude, by Colombian author Gabriel García Márquez, is a masterpiece of magical realism. It tells the story of the Buendía family over several generations in the fictional town of Macondo.

booksList.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
booksList.description: The Harry Potter series, written by J.K. Rowling, follows the adventures of a young wizard named Harry Potter and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley as they attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
